proposal1.heroHeadline: Neon Ambition is losing 300 hours a year on proposals. Here's where it goes.
proposal1.heroSubheadline: Your team spends hours creating proposals for SEO and PPC, now finished in 47 seconds.
proposal1.problemsIntro: Every minute spent manually crafting proposals is a missed opportunity for growth.

problems.title: Time Sinks
problems.description: Each proposal takes up to 5 hours. With 60 proposals a year, that's 300 hours lost. Time that could be spent on high-impact activities.

problems.title: Missed Leads
problems.description: Slow proposal generation means delayed responses. Every 24-hour delay could lose a potential lead. It's costing you clients.

problems.title: Consistency Issues
problems.description: Inconsistent branding in proposals leads to confusion and weakens your message. A muddled brand costs trust and sales.

problems.title: High Labor Cost
problems.description: Paying skilled team members to format proposals. At $50/hour, that's $15,000 annually lost to routine tasks.

problems.title: Error Prone
problems.description: Manual entries lead to errors. A single mistake can lose a client or damage relationships, bleeding revenue.

problems.title: Untracked Proposals
problems.description: No tracking means no insights into client engagement. Without data, you're flying blind, missing strategic adjustments.

proposal1.solutionIntro: Our AI system transforms your proposal process, addressing each loss above.

solutions.title: Instant Proposal Generation
solutions.description: Currently, creating a proposal takes hours. Our system delivers a complete proposal in under 60 seconds.

solutions.title: Brand Consistency
solutions.description: Manual formatting leads to inconsistencies. Our AI ensures every proposal aligns perfectly with your brand.

solutions.title: Cost Reduction
solutions.description: Paying high labor costs for proposal work. Our system cuts those costs by automating the entire process.

solutions.title: Accuracy Assurance
solutions.description: Manual input leads to errors. Our AI eliminates errors by automating data scraping and entry.

solutions.title: Proposal Tracking
solutions.description: No system for tracking proposal engagement. Our solution provides complete analytics on client interactions.

proposal1.whyUsIntro: Four reasons this works. Not marketing claims. Engineering facts.

whyUsCards.title: Speed
whyUsCards.description: Every hour your team spends writing proposals is an hour not spent closing deals. This system gives those hours back. Lead data in, live proposal out, 60 seconds.

whyUsCards.title: Personalization
whyUsCards.description: Generic proposals get ignored. Personalized proposals close. The system reads each prospect's website and reflects their services, tone, and positioning back to them. Written from scratch, not templated.

whyUsCards.title: Ownership
whyUsCards.description: No monthly subscription bleeding your budget. No vendor deciding to raise prices or shut down. You own the source code, the infrastructure, and the data. Permanently.

whyUsCards.title: Support
whyUsCards.description: Personal onboarding, a video walkthrough your team can reference anytime, and one week of post-delivery support. You are not left figuring this out alone.

fearCards.title: You are probably thinking: our stack is complicated.
fearCards.sub: CRM, email, Sheets, Slack. The system connects to whatever you already use. No migration.

fearCards.title: You might be wondering if this breaks your current workflow.
fearCards.sub: It runs alongside everything you have. Nothing changes except the time you spend on proposals.

fearCards.title: You are concerned the output will not match your standards.
fearCards.sub: Revisions are part of the build. We configure, test, and refine until the output matches your bar exactly.

proposal1.teamIntro: Your point of contact. No handoffs, no account managers, no layers.

team.name: Ayush Chauhan
team.bio: Full-stack engineer specializing in AI automation for agencies and service businesses. Every engagement personally handled from architecture through deployment. 15+ systems built. Zero failed deliveries. Works async, ships fast.

proposal1.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Kickoff (Async or Call)
process.description: We map your workflow, services, and current proposal process. Can be a 15-minute call or handled entirely over email. By the end, we have everything needed to configure the system.

process.title: System Configuration
process.description: The engine gets configured with your services, pricing structure, tone of voice, and brand standards. Every proposal it generates will sound like your best strategist wrote it.

process.title: Build and QA
process.description: Test proposals generated and reviewed against your quality bar. Refinements continue until the output is indistinguishable from what your team produces manually.

process.title: Deployment and Handoff
process.description: Deployed to production with full infrastructure. You receive a video walkthrough, documentation, and complete source code. From this point, the system runs without us.

proposal1.pricingIntro: Two options. Both are one-time builds. No subscriptions, no recurring fees. You own the source code and infrastructure permanently.

pricing.name: Proposal Engine
pricing.subtitle: // Core System
pricing.description: Custom proposal automation configured for Neon Ambition's services, voice, and pricing structure.

pricing.name: Engine + AI Chatbot
pricing.subtitle: // Recommended
pricing.description: Everything above, plus an AI sales assistant embedded in every proposal. Handles objections, answers questions, and books calls for Neon Ambition around the clock.
features: AI chatbot on every proposal page

proposal1.ctaHeadline: See this running on your actual proposals.
proposal1.ctaDescription: Reply here or email Ayush directly. He will send the onboarding form. Takes about 10 minutes and the build starts the same day. Custom-configured for Neon Ambition.

proposal2.heroHeadline: Transform Acme Corp's Growth with Neon Ambition's Proven Strategies
proposal2.heroSubheadline: We'll partner with Acme Corp to turn every missed opportunity into a win using our specialized SEO, PPC, and Content services.
proposal2.problemsIntro: Every visitor who leaves your site without converting is revenue walking out the door.

problems.title: Low Conversion Rates
problems.description: Your website sees a lot of traffic, yet the conversion rate is below industry standard. This means thousands of potential customers leaving without a purchase.

problems.title: Poor SEO Rankings
problems.description: With current rankings, Acme Corp is missing out on 60% of potential organic traffic, letting competitors capture your audience.

problems.title: Ineffective PPC Campaigns
problems.description: Current PPC campaigns are not optimized, resulting in a 30% higher cost per click than necessary. Money wasted on ineffective ads.

problems.title: Weak Social Media Presence
problems.description: Social media channels are underutilized, reaching only 20% of your potential audience. Missing out on valuable engagement and brand loyalty.

problems.title: Content Gaps
problems.description: Your content strategy lacks depth, resulting in low user engagement and missed opportunities for lead generation.

problems.title: Suboptimal CRO
problems.description: Without a focused Conversion Rate Optimization strategy, Acme Corp is losing potential sales daily.

proposal2.solutionIntro: Our tailored solutions will directly address these losses, turning challenges into growth opportunities.

solutions.title: SEO Optimization
solutions.description: Boost your search rankings to reclaim lost traffic and increase visibility.

solutions.title: PPC Management
solutions.description: Refine your PPC campaigns to reduce costs and increase effectiveness.

solutions.title: CRO Strategy
solutions.description: Optimize your conversion pathways to transform visitors into customers.

solutions.title: Content Marketing
solutions.description: Develop a rich content strategy to engage users and generate leads.

proposal2.whyUsIntro: Neon Ambition is your partner in driving measurable growth.

whyUsCards.title: Proven Results
whyUsCards.description: Our strategies have consistently delivered measurable growth for businesses like yours.

whyUsCards.title: Collaborative Approach
whyUsCards.description: We work closely with you, ensuring our solutions align with your business goals.

whyUsCards.title: Data-Driven Strategy
whyUsCards.description: Our decisions are backed by data to ensure maximum impact and efficiency.

whyUsCards.title: Creative Solutions
whyUsCards.description: Our team brings innovative ideas to every project, ensuring you stand out.

proposal2.teamIntro: Meet the passionate team driving your success.

team.name: Jordan Slover
team.bio: Jordan leads strategy and client relationships, ensuring each partnership thrives with tailored solutions and expert insight.

proposal2.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Discovery and Strategy
process.description: We'll dive deep into understanding your goals and challenges.

process.title: Implementation
process.description: Executing the plan with precision and expertise.

process.title: Monitoring and Adjustment
process.description: Continuous monitoring and tweaking to ensure optimal performance.

process.title: Review and Scale
process.description: Reviewing results and planning for future growth.

pricing.name: Starter Plan
pricing.description: Ideal for businesses looking to establish a strong online presence.

pricing.name: Growth Plan
pricing.description: Our recommended plan for businesses ready to scale.

pricing.description: Perfect for businesses aiming for industry leadership.

proposal2.ctaDescription: Let's explore how we can help Acme Corp achieve its goals. No strings attached, just a friendly conversation.
proposal2.footerSub: Growing your business with passion and expertise.
